    • getTask

      @GetMapping("/tasks/{id}") @PreAuthorize("hasAnyAuthority(\'ADMIN\',\'COMMON_USER\')") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<TaskDto> getTask(@PathVariable("id") UUID id)

    • getAllTasks

      @GetMapping("/tasks") @PreAuthorize("hasAnyAuthority(\'ADMIN\',\'COMMON_USER\')") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<TaskPage> getAllTasks(@RequestParam(required=false) String title, @RequestParam(required=false) String description, @RequestParam(required=false) String status, @RequestParam(required=false) String priority, @RequestParam(required=false) String authorId, @RequestParam(required=false) String executorId, @RequestParam(defaultValue="0") int page, @RequestParam(defaultValue="10") int size)

    • addTask

      @PostMapping("/tasks") @PreAuthorize("hasAnyAuthority(\'ADMIN\')") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<TaskDto> addTask(@RequestBody @Valid @Valid TaskForm form)

    • updateTask

      @PatchMapping("/tasks/{id}") @PreAuthorize("hasAnyAuthority(\'ADMIN\')") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<TaskDto> updateTask(@PathVariable("id") UUID id, @RequestBody @Valid @Valid TaskForm form)

    • updateTaskStatus

      @PatchMapping("/tasks/{id}/status") @PreAuthorize("hasAnyAuthority(\'ADMIN\',\'COMMON_USER\')") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<TaskDto> updateTaskStatus(@PathVariable("id") UUID id, @RequestBody @Valid @Valid TaskStatusForm status)

    • deleteTask

      @DeleteMapping("/tasks/{id}") @PreAuthorize("hasAnyAuthority(\'ADMIN\')") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> deleteTask(@PathVariable("id") UUID id)

    • getAllAuthorTasks

      @GetMapping("/account/{id}/tasks/created") @PreAuthorize("hasAnyAuthority(\'ADMIN\',\'COMMON_USER\')") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<TaskPage> getAllAuthorTasks(@PathVariable("id") UUID id, @RequestParam(required=false) String title, @RequestParam(required=false) String description, @RequestParam(required=false) String status, @RequestParam(required=false) String priority, @RequestParam(required=false) String executorId, @RequestParam(defaultValue="0") int page, @RequestParam(defaultValue="10") int size)

    • getAllExecutorTasks

      @GetMapping("/account/{id}/tasks/assigned") @PreAuthorize("hasAnyAuthority(\'ADMIN\',\'COMMON_USER\')") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<TaskPage> getAllExecutorTasks(@PathVariable("id") UUID id, @RequestParam(required=false) String title, @RequestParam(required=false) String description, @RequestParam(required=false) String status, @RequestParam(required=false) String priority, @RequestParam(required=false) String authorId, @RequestParam(defaultValue="0") int page, @RequestParam(defaultValue="10") int size)
